reference.title: Insurance Manager
reference.shortdesc: The Insurance Control option enables you to select policy options and diagnostic utilities.

refbody.section:
To enter Insurance Control, log into the insurance portal and navigate to the policy management section.
Insurance Control details This table provides the details of the options available on the Insurance Control screen.
Option Description
Insurance Control The system attempts to process policies starting with the first item in the policy order. If the attempt fails, the system continues with the next item in the policy order until the process is successful or no more policy options are found.
Insurance Control Enables you to access the policy menu, where you can select a one-time policy option to process.
Insurance Control Enables you to access Insurance Control.
Insurance Control Enables you to launch the Insurance Control menu such as Launch Diagnostics, Policy update File Explorer, Reboot System.
